content.rendered:
Services

Page Speed Optimization Services

Fed up with your slow loading WordPress site? Let us make the optimization and get the best loading speed for your website!

Why choose us?

Stop losing visitors because of the slow loading pages on your site! Our web development team is ready to make all the advanced page speed optimization services needed to make your page blazing-fast

We are ready when you are!

  • Analysis of the current page speed loading (GTmetrix, YSlow, etc.).
  • Installing and configuring a cache plugin.
  • Manual combining of the JavaScripts and CSS files (where possible).
  • Minification of the JavaScripts and CSS files.
  • GZip compression (if supported on a server).
  • Optimization of the Images.
  • Setting up CDN (optional).

99$/h

Order Now

tagDiv exponentially improved the upload speed of the website. The team is efficient, eager to help, and highly responsive. I was impressed with their speed and customer service.

Teresa Baker Botelho

Owner & Publisher, BRZ Group

Related Services

Basic WordPress
& Plugins

Installation of the default WordPress CMS and the best plugins for your WP website. Get it right straight from the beginning!

Price: $48

Show me more

Web Development Customizations

CSS, JavaScript, and PHP professional customization. Get the experts to work & give an exceptional facelift to your site!

Price: $70 per hour

Show me more

Design & Content Management

Transform the ‘not so beautiful’ pages into eye-catching, engaging content. Our designers are ready to solve this challenge for you!

Price: $50 per hour

Show me more

Explore more Customization Services

Migrate you website from another CMS to WordPress

Migrate your website from another CMS/HTML to WordPress. No hassle, no stress, just a friendly team on the email ready to make it happen for you.

Price: $70 per hour

See the package

Migrate old WordPress
content to a new theme

Migrate your old content to the new cutting-edge technology. Reshaping your content with a new theme is a few clicks away. We'll make sure everything looks and works perfect!

Price: $70 per hour

See the package

Migrate Your Website
to Another Server

Safely transfer your website to a new server and domain. We make migrating easy for you. Let the web development experts take care of everything and enjoy the results!

Price: $70 per hour

See the package

Breathe life into your website!

Our expert team is ready to make all the advanced page speed optimization services needed to give you a fast website. If your website can not be optimized due to slow loading external resources, content or server capabilities, we'll decline the project and you will not be charged.

Order Now $200
